description: This walk runs from Peterborough to Stamford through countryside and agricultural land. The path passes Marholm, Helpston and Barnack before finishing with a riverside stretch along the River Welland into Stamford. In Stamford you can extend your walk by visiting Burghley House. Head south from the trail to explore the stunning Capability Brown landscaped grounds.
